name: Tata Sky
shortDescription: DVD picture quality with CD quality sound
longDescription: Unlike generic set top boxes, Tata Sky offers a host of exciting services such as Active services and Showcase, our Pay-Per- View movie service. Tata Sky DTH also gives you the luxury to select the shows of your choice through innovative packaging offerings such as Make My Pack and TruChoice.

name: Tata Sky+ Transfer HD
longDescription: If watching your favourite recorded shows at home is a rare luxury, our new set top box will fit right into your busy lifestyle.Our latest product Tata Sky+ Transfer HD allows you to transfer/stream your favourite recorded shows, directly on your Android or iOS device, anytime, anywhere!
includes: *Tata Sky+ Transfer HD Connection + Standard Activation

name: MultiTV Connection
longDescription: Our MultiTV Service allows you to access your favourite Tata Sky Channels and services on multiple televisions at home at an attractive pricing for the 2nd, 3rd and 4th connection.

name: Tata Sky HD
longDescription: With great picture quality, incredibly vivid colours, sharper images and stunning surround sound, Tata Sky HD takes TV viewing to a whole new level. An aspect ratio of 16:9 and 1080i resolution ensures an enhanced viewing experience.

name: Tata Sky 4K
longDescription: Presenting the future ready Ultra High Definition 4K that takes TV viewing to an unimaginable new level! Now see picture details like never before.Tata Sky 4K - The best partner to your 4K TV.

name: Karaoke
shortDescription: So what if you can't hold a tune?
longDescription: You love singing and that is all that matters! Our all-new service aims to put you in the spotlight where you can sing your favourite songs to your heart’s content. A first for the DTH industry, Tata Sky’s Karaoke service boasts of an updated video.
features: Watch the original music video as you sing along.
Select either the Instrumental mode or sing along with the vocals.
Challenge your friends and family and see who can hold a tune best, with our one-of-a-kind ‘Score’ mode.
